html: As we await the release of the redacted Mueller report, I just have to say: AG Barr’s performance for Trump this AM was astonishing. The AG is supposed to work #ForThePeople, not put the President’s interests first. I agree w @SpeakerPelosi that Mueller must publicly testify.
text:
As we await the release of the redacted Mueller report, I just have to say: AG Barr’s performance for Trump this AM was astonishing. 

The AG is supposed to work #ForThePeople, not put the President’s interests first. I agree w @SpeakerPelosi that Mueller must publicly testify.

text:

9/11 is sacred. The loss we experienced that day and in the weeks and months since are still raw and still with us.

html: Congress must stand on the side of the people and #ProtectOurCare. Today, we’ll vote on my resolution calling on the Trump Administration to stop backing a lawsuit that threatens Americans’ health care and protections for those with pre-existing conditions.
text:
Congress must stand on the side of the people and #ProtectOurCare.

Today, we’ll vote on my resolution calling on the Trump Administration to stop backing a lawsuit that threatens Americans’ health care and protections for those with pre-existing conditions.

html: 58. @RepMaloney (D-NY) asked if Secretary Ross read memo by @uscensusbureau's Chief Scientist John Abowd recommending against adding #CitizenshipQuestion. Ross: "Not all questions can be answered yes or no." Maloney: "I'm going to take that as a no."
text:
58. @RepMaloney (D-NY) asked if Secretary Ross read memo by @uscensusbureau's Chief Scientist John Abowd recommending against adding #CitizenshipQuestion.

Ross: "Not all questions can be answered yes or no."

Maloney: "I'm going to take that as a no."

html: .@RepMaloney asking if Ross read analysis from top Census Bureau scientist warning against adding a citizenship question. Ross says can't answer with yes or no. Maloney says "I'm going to take that as a no" and moves on.

html: (1/2) Only 17% of workers in the US have access to paid family leave through their employers. This means that 83% of American workers who must take care of old/new family have to choose between that and earning a living. This lack of support is unacceptable.

html: 1 year ago on 2/14/18, 17 were killed in a senseless act of gun violence at Stoneman Douglas HS in Parkland. As I lead this moment of silence, I ask that this not be in vain. We must work together to end this silence with action to make our communities safer from gun violence.pic.twitter.com/T8mDbh399t
text:
1 year ago on 2/14/18, 17 were killed in a senseless act of gun violence at Stoneman Douglas HS in Parkland.

As I lead this moment of silence, I ask that this not be in vain. We must work together to end this silence with action to make our communities safer from gun violence.pic.twitter.com/T8mDbh399t

html: NY receives $60 billion in annual federal funding using Census data. An inaccurate Census means less critical funding for Medicare and Medicaid to infrastructure, education, and children’s health insurance. We must protect the #2020Census to protect NY. 2/3
